src:
Hendak Cium Patung Cristiano Ronaldo, Via Vallen Curi Perhatian
04 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Masyarakat Indonesia, pasti tidak asing dengan sosok Via Vallen. Penyanyi dangdut asal Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur itu dikenal sebagai penggemar sepak bola. Ia pernah terlihat menyaksikan timnas Indonesia pada Piala AFF U-16 2018 di Stadion Gelora Delta, Sidoarjo.
Via juga pernah menonton langsung perhelatan Piala Dunia 2018 di Rusia. Terbaru, pelantun lagu 'Sayang' itu membuat geger dunia maya. Ia mengunggah foto memeluk dan hendak mencium patung Cristiano Ronaldo.
Pada unggahan 3 November 2019 tersebut, ia menuliskan caption menggelitik. "Dia milikku, mau ngapain kamu? Hahahaha. Padahal cuma berani gininya sama patung lilinnya saja," tulis Via.
text:
Want to Kiss the Statue of Cristiano Ronaldo, Via Vallen Steal Attention
Nov 04 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian people, certainly no stranger to the figure of Via Vallen. Dangdut singer from Sidoarjo, East Java was known as a football fan. He was seen watching the Indonesian national team in the 2018 AFF Cup U-16 at the Gelora Delta Stadium, Sidoarjo.
Via has also watched the 2018 World Cup event in Russia. The latest, the singer of the song 'Sayang' that made a virtual commotion. He uploaded a hugging photo and was about to kiss the statue of Cristiano Ronaldo.
On the November 3, 2019 upload, he wrote a tickling tickle caption. "He is mine, what are you going to do? Hahahaha. Even though he only dared to cook the same wax statue," wrote Via.
